text: Richard Lavender was an English priest in the late 15th and early 16th centuries."Bibliotheca Topographica Britannica: Antiquities in Leicestershire, Volume 7" p487: London; J. Nicols; 1790 Lavender was educated at Winchester College and New College, Oxford.University of Leicester He was Archdeacon of Leicester from 1485 until his death in 1508. == Notes == Category:Archdeacons of Leicester Category:15th-century English clergy Category:15th-century births Category:Year of birth uncertain Category:1508 deaths Category:16th-century English clergy Category:Alumni of New College, Oxford Category:People educated at Winchester College
title: Richard Lavender
